title: Can't sign in after new patch came out recently
body: Recently after the new patch I can't seem to log in, this error pops up when I try to log in (don't worry I took out my username for the sake of the photo.) I've already tried a different account and the same thing seems to show up. I've also tried basic trouble shooting e.g client repairs etc and still no luck, any help would be appreciated :D

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for me, let me know if anything helps.
I've just tried them out, nothing seems to be working
